name: part_000
file: tmp_【 #ねぽらぼアイドル衣装 】アイドル衣装お披露目POL！！リレーするPOLよ！！！！！【尾丸ポルカ⧸ホロライブ】 [jrRr7c2N8E0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title screen for Omaru Polka's idol costume reveal.
A fairy-tale style narration by Ceres Fauna introducing Polka in a forest setting.
Omaru Polka performs 'Shiroi Yuki no Princess wa' in her new idol costume.

subtitles.original: A long, long time ago
subtitles.english: A long, long time ago

subtitles.original: in a land far, far away
subtitles.english: in a land far, far away

subtitles.original: lived Polka, a beautiful maiden who drew the ire of her queen
subtitles.english: lived Polka, a beautiful maiden who drew the ire of her queen

subtitles.original: for she too wished to be the prettiest being in the world.
subtitles.english: for she too wished to be the prettiest being in the world.

subtitles.original: One day, Polka was walking through the forest when she met an old woman.
subtitles.english: One day, Polka was walking through the forest when she met an old woman.

subtitles.original: "Would you like an apple? My, but these are ripe and tasty," she said.
subtitles.english: "Would you like an apple? My, but these are ripe and tasty," she said.

subtitles.original: Tempted by the offer, Polka gladly took a bite.
subtitles.english: Tempted by the offer, Polka gladly took a bite.

subtitles.original: As Polka was spellbound by how delicious the apple was, the old woman vanished.
subtitles.english: As Polka was spellbound by how delicious the apple was, the old woman vanished.

subtitles.original: It was then that Polka made the realization:
subtitles.english: It was then that Polka made the realization:

subtitles.original: the Apple was poisoned.
subtitles.english: the Apple was poisoned.

subtitles.original: But it was too late.
subtitles.english: But it was too late.

subtitles.original: Polka collapsed to the ground helplessly.
subtitles.english: Polka collapsed to the ground helplessly.

subtitles.original: Many moons later, the fateful moment had arrived.
subtitles.english: Many moons later, the fateful moment had arrived.

subtitles.original: A prince had appeared before Polka.
subtitles.english: A prince had appeared before Polka.

subtitles.original: He was captivated by her beauty and eventually gave her the kiss of fate...
subtitles.english: He was captivated by her beauty and eventually gave her the kiss of fate...

subtitles.original: And Polka awakened, ever so beautiful!
subtitles.english: And Polka awakened, ever so beautiful!

subtitles.original: Her beauty had not diminished over time,
subtitles.english: Her beauty had not diminished over time,

subtitles.original: as though reality was but a virtual concept to her...
subtitles.english: as though reality was but a virtual concept to her...

subtitles.original: Hm? But wait, Polka is a virtual idol, so poisoned apples won't work on her.
subtitles.english: Hm? But wait, Polka is a virtual idol, so poisoned apples won't work on her.

subtitles.original: But don't get me wrong, Polka-senpai is incredibly pretty!
subtitles.english: But don't get me wrong, Polka-senpai is incredibly pretty!

subtitles.original: Now, Polka-senpai, go on and show off your reborn self as an idol!
subtitles.english: Now, Polka-senpai, go on and show off your reborn self as an idol!

subtitles.original:
白い雪のプリンセスは
作詞・作曲：のぼる↑
subtitles.english:
The Snow White Princess is
Lyrics & Music: Noboru↑

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡よ鏡さん
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, oh mirror

subtitles.original: 世界で一番可愛いのは
subtitles.english: Who is the cutest in the world?

subtitles.original: やめてよ 棘のような視線
subtitles.english: Stop it, those thorn-like glares

subtitles.original: 丸く優しいふりした彼女
subtitles.english: She who pretended to be round and kind

subtitles.original: 素敵な晩餐をもてなした
subtitles.english: Served a wonderful dinner
